description: Try our easy to follow Winnie The Pooh Honey & Banana Faces recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Winnie The Pooh Honey & Banana Faces Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a 10cm fluted cutter, cut rounds from bread slices. Using a knife, carefully cut 12 of the slices to form Winnie the Pooh faces (see Note). Lightly toast under a medium grill.
Place melted chocolate in piping bag fitted with a small plain nozzle. Use melted chocolate to carefully add the facial features.
Spread bread rounds with peanut butter, if desired. Slice banana and arrange over peanut butter. Drizzle with honey. Top with a face.
